DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy brimonidine Purite , dorzolamide , brinzolamide reduce intraocular pressure add prostaglandin analog therapy ( bimatoprost , latanoprost , travoprost ) patient glaucoma ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Brimonidine Purite , Dorzolamide , Brinzolamide Adjunctive Therapy Prostaglandin Analogs
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis primary openangle glaucoma ocular hypertension . Must 40 year age . Intraocular pressure must 18 mm Hg high 6 week treatment ( runin ) prostaglandin analog ( bimatoprost , latanoprost , travoprost ) . History angle closure narrow angle . Previous intraocular surgery . Laser trabeculoplasty within 3 month prior screen . History uveitis intraocular inflammation . Use medication study medication know affect IOP ( e.g. , betablockers , steroid , angiotensin II blocker ) within 3 month study entry study . Intolerance hypersensitivity prostaglandin analog , sulfonamide , alphaagonists , preservative benzalkonium chloride . Women childbearing age pregnant use contraception .
